cscie97.asn3.ecommerce.collection

Class Collection

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie97.asn3.ecommerce.collection.Collectible
      • cscie97.asn3.ecommerce.collection.Collection

  • public abstract class Collection
extends Collectible
    Author:
    ssingh Collection class represents the composite collection which includes set of products and set collections. This is abstract because a collection does not fully qualify the method by which it can store products. So it declares an abstract method getContainedProducts() which is overridden by concrete classes DynamicCollection and StaticCollection. Otherwise this class defined all the methods and properties of a collection

    • Method Detail

      • getContainedProducts

        public abstract java.util.List<cscie97.asn3.ecommerce.collection.ProductProxy> getContainedProducts()
        Abstract method for subclasses to implement. Concrete classes know the policy of fetching products it contains. E.g. Dynamic collection calls product service API to get all products which meets its criteria.
        Returns:
        products contained by collection

      • getType

        public abstract java.lang.String getType()
        Abstract class for subclasses to override. Subclasses return type of collection they are (static or dynamic). Useful in printing info about the collection.
        Returns:
        - type of collection ( static or dynamic )
